Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.debug

Interface StatisticsObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Debugger
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface StatisticsObserver
    A StatisticsObserver will function as the Observer from the Observable-pattern, for changes in the EntityCollectionStatistics.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void update​(EntityCollectionStatistics statistics)
      Is called by the observed EntityCollection.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update​(EntityCollectionStatistics statistics)
        Is called by the observed EntityCollection.
        Parameters:
        statistics - An instance of EntityCollectionStatistics that encapsulates the latest statistical information regarding the observed EntityCollection.
